description: Led globally distributed Host experience engineering teams. Hosts provide land for tent campers, glampers, and RVers.
Projects: New improved checkout experience, new tooling and integrations for professional campgrounds, updated data model to support new tooling.
Promoted 2 engineers; managed 10 engineers and 2 managers across 3 teams in the US and UK; moved one engineer into managed as a growth opportunity
technicalHighlights: Researched integrations such as ResNexus and distilled in technical document that was handed off to a direct report to peform technical design and lead project.
